roleset.name: to bring into accord
roleset.note: ATTUNE-V NOTES: Frame created by Claire (from attune.01-v)

example.name: Descriptive Usage
example.text: A brisk, amusing man, apparently constructed * on an ingenious system ofspring-joints attuned *none* to the same peppery rhythm as his mind...
example.arg: to the same peppery rhythm as his mind
